T02D1553:202b-1: dznya n'a be sha n'a ma /
T02D1553:202b-3: ye shes 'pho ba zhes bya ba /
T02D1553:202b-4: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1553:203a-0: mu yig gis spras byi ru'i chun @203a * //
T02D1553:203a-1: po ltar gsal skar bcas dgongs ka'i thun mtshams 'dra //
T02D1553:203a-2: me stag rab 'phro 'jigs bye me 'bar lta bur phyogs dang nam mkha' gsal byed cing /
T02D1553:203a-3: me tog dkar po dang ldan gyi shu ka yi mi tog 'bar ba'i tshogs 'dra ba //
T02D1553:203a-4: gzi brjid du mas rnam brgyan dmar ba'i sku mnga' rdo rje phag mo khyed la bsrungs //
T02D1553:203a-5: nyes mtsho'i chu rnams ma lus pa las rgal gyur ye shes dam pas yang dag brgyan //
T02D1553:203a-6: gzhan don la brtson bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo 'jigs ma la btud nas //
T02D1553:203a-7: shin tu gting zab dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud las yang dag blangs gyur pa //
T02D1553:203a-8: ye shes dbab pa'i cho gas gsang ba yid ches skyed byed tshul bzhin brjod par bya //
T02D1553:203a-9: bsam gtan khang pa yid 'ong skye bo dang bral dri zhim chus brlan sar zhugs te //
T02D1553:203a-10: shin tu 'jam zhing mtho ba'i stan la 'dug nas phyir la 'jigs pa sel byed pa'i //
T02D1553:203a-11: gsang sngags brjod nas de 'og mdun du me tog
T02D1553:203a-12: gis ni byugs gyur dkyil 'khor dag / cho ga
T02D1553:203a-13: bzang po byas nas bzlas pa byas pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D1553:203a-15: 'byung po'i tshogs la gtan pa'i gtor ma btang nas
T02D1553:203a-16: 'bad pa dam pas thang ka dag / mdun du
T02D1553:203a-17: bkram nas spos kyis bdugs shing mchod nas blo bzangs
T02D1553:203a-19: sprul pa'i 'khor lor nyi ma'i sa bon las gyur me gzugs dmar po gru gsum la //
T02D1553:203a-20: chu skyes dmar po dus kyi 'dab ma dang ldan rab tu 'bar zhing rgyas pa bsgom //
T02D1553:203a-21: der ni ro yi snying gar 'od drod can steng shin tu g-yon brkyang zhabs bzhugs pa //
T02D1553:203a-22: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo phag pa'i zhal mnga' rab tu khro mo ni //
T02D1553:203a-23: phyag rgya lnga pos brgyan cing spyan gsum dang ldan rgyas shing gsus pa shin tu grims //
T02D1553:203a-24: khro gnyer rab tu bsnyer zhing ljags g-yug hr'i: yi sgra yis zhal ni gang gyur cing //
T02D1553:203a-25: 'jigs ma 'od tshogs 'phro ba las kyes rgyal bas sems can don rnams mdzad //
T02D1553:203a-26: gcer bu thod phreng rdo rjes brgyus pas dbu skra kham pa gyen brdzes ma //
T02D1553:203a-27: rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal mtshan thod bcas sdigs mdzub
T02D1553:203a-28: bcas pa'i zhags pa dag / rig byed tshad kyis
T02D1553:203a-29: phyag mchog rnams kyis bsnams shing spyang mo 'gying bag
T02D1553:203a-30: dang ldan ma // rgya skyegs ki shu bandu dzi
T02D1553:203a-31: ba ka dang ki li'i me tog ltar dmar ba
T02D1553:203b-0: dang ldan ma // // @203b skul mgo phreng las
T02D1553:203b-1: byas do shal gyis brgyan rgyas zhing mkhregs pa'i nu
T02D1553:203b-3: pa dang dpal mo zla tshes mkha' bcas sa mtha'
T02D1553:203b-5: kun dga' dang bcas thugs rje'i chus brlan thugs can ye shes mngon rtogs skyed mdzad blta //
T02D1553:203b-6: de nas ye shes 'bar ba dam tshig chud cing lus la drug po bkod byas na //
T02D1553:203b-7: de la sems las byung ba'i cho ga dag dang phyi nang shin du gsang rnams dang //
T02D1553:203b-8: bstod pa sna tshogs dag dang glu dbyangs mchog rnams kyis ni rab tu mchod bya zhing //
T02D1553:203b-9: thal mo sbyar nas gus dang bcas pa'i sems kyis de la mgo bos phyag bya'o //
T02D1553:203b-10: de la sprul 'khor la gnas rgyal ba'i pho brang le brgan rtsi ltar dmar ba la //
T02D1553:203b-11: steng zur 'og gu rig byed sgo dang drag po nyi ma lta bu dag dang ni //
T02D1553:203b-12: 'og zur steng du bsil zer can dang mkha' ldan yi ge tha ma'i gong ma dang //
T02D1553:203b-13: dbus su 'od zer dmar po mtha' yas rnams kyis phyogs mtha' snang byed sa bon bsgom //
T02D1553:203b-14: de nas rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas rab mdzes 'khor lo lta bur 'khor bar bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1553:203b-15: sngags kyang bzlas te stobs bzangs las byas bdug pa sngags ldan blo dang ldan pas bsregs //
T02D1553:203b-16: ma lus rgyal ba'i sku ldan lha mo 'bod pa'i de ma thag tu a'a be sha ya dang //
T02D1553:203b-17: de nas skul byed de rjes rang gi sa bon de 'og me yi btsun mo yin //
T02D1553:203b-18: sku dang cha kun tha ma'i rjes la mchog gi sa bon de nas glang po ste //
T02D1553:203b-19: de rjes dran yig brten pa'i ksha ltag nam mkha' zur ldan rjes la'ang de nyid yin //
T02D1553:203b-20: aom hr'im ham dang yi rjes la'ang bde ba'i yi ge gsum dang ni //
T02D1553:203b-21: hi hi phem gsum de dag rim bzhin bzlas dang bsreg dang mtshan mo'i gtor ma'i yin //
T02D1553:203b-22: nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu pa nas brtsams nyi ma so sor cho ga yi //
T02D1553:203b-23: bzlas pa gtor ma mchod par ldan pa'i bsam gtan dam pa bsgrubs byas na //
T02D1553:203b-24: shin tu rgya chen mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rang bzhin dngos grub blang ba yis //
T02D1553:203b-25: thod pa 'di la legs pa la ston blo chen rnams kyis 'khrul mi bya //
T02D1553:203b-26: ye shes dbab pa'i cho ga las bsgom pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1553:203b-28: // / slob ma gus ldan zhabs pad la btung rnams kyis gsol ba btab gyur bla ma yis //
T02D1553:203b-29: nag po'i tshes mchog ji skad brjod pa de dag legs pa kho nar yang dag gzung //
T02D1553:204a-1: 'og 'khor lor cho ga bzang pos ji skad brjod pa'i lha mo mchog bsgoms nas //
T02D1553:204a-2: de yi rtsi bas ldan 'og mar sngar bzhin 'khor lo mdzes pa 'khor bar bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1553:204a-3: de 'og lag nas rdor 'dzin phul te ji srid mgo la mgon ldan me tog can //
T02D1553:204a-4: de dag ma lus shin tu babs gyur bar du yang dag bdug cing gsang sngags brjod //
T02D1553:204a-5: phebs par gyur tshe grang dang tshad pa chen po la gnas lta bur spu ldang zhing //
T02D1553:204a-6: mig nas mchi ma 'dzag cing 'dar la 'gyel zhing ye shes dag ni skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1553:204a-7: de dag rnam gnas gyur pa rnams la rnal 'byor chen po mchod pa'i cho ga dang //
T02D1553:204a-8: bsgom bya bzlas bya bdug par ldan pa'i gang sngags don kun sgrub byed rnams kyang brjod //
T02D1553:204a-9: gang dag dang dang bral ba'i sems ldan blun zhing sdig pa'i las la brtson gyur pa //
T02D1553:204a-10: gus pas bkur sti byed pa'i ngor ni mi de rnams la 'di ni brjod mi bya //
T02D1553:204a-11: ye shes dbab pa'i cho ga las slob ma rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1553:204a-13: // / yang dag grub dang slob ma bzang 'dzin byed pas phyi rol mchod pa byed gyur pas //
T02D1553:204a-14: mdun du khu ba dmar pos me tog dmar po dang ldan mandala byas nas ni //
T02D1553:204a-15: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i 'khar snod la brten snod chen mnyam pa de la lag g-yon gyis //
T02D1553:204a-16: 'khor lo zur gsum mdzes pa sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas mngon par bris nas ni //
T02D1553:204a-17: de la sngar bshad yi ge bzhi po bgegs bdag dbang po'i mgo rgyan phye ba yis //
T02D1553:204a-18: nub tu kha bltas gsang sngags rig pas lag pa g-yon gyis snga ma bzhin du bri //
T02D1553:204a-19: de nas cho ga'i rim pas ye shes bkug nas myur du dam tshig la gzhug bya //
T02D1553:204a-20: de la dri dang spos mchog me tog dri zhim mar me lha bshos rnams dang ni //
T02D1553:204a-21: 'dod pa lnga dang mchog gyur bdud rtsi stobs dang thug pa gzhi pa bzang po dang //
T02D1553:204a-22: bcas dang bza' ba bde gshegs drug pa dang ni khar ba'i sil khrol bcas glu dang //
T02D1553:204a-23: pi wang gling bu'i rnga rim rdza rnga pa ta ha rnams dang ni dung dag dang //
T02D1553:204a-24: zangs dung rnams kyi sgra snyan gar bcas dge legs kyis ni mchod cing bstod pa ste //
T02D1553:204a-25: mchod pa'i tshul mchog legs pa sna tshogs rnams kyis rnam pa kun du mchod bya zhing //
T02D1553:204a-26: gus pas thal sbyar zhes bcas pas dpe med phyag ni rab tu btsal bar bya //
T02D1553:204b-0: sngags rnam so sor cho ga bzang pos @204b bzlas pa yis ni 'bum du longs byas te //
T02D1553:204b-1: rdo rje la sems dbye bas 'dis ni bzas na gsum du nges par 'gyur pa yin //
T02D1553:204b-2: gang tshe lta bar 'dod pa skyes na de tshe yi ge dang bcas pa'i //
T02D1553:204b-3: 'khor lo mdzes pa de dag bzhugs pa'i bla ma la yang rab btung nas //
T02D1553:204b-4: mu: yig bcas sngags cho ga ldan par 'dug pa rab tu brjod nas ni //
T02D1553:204b-5: skyes bu don mchog la brtson blo yis bsam gtan las ni yang dag ldang //
T02D1553:204b-6: ye shes dbab pa'i cho ga las ni phyi rol mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1553:204b-7: gang zhig bshad zin cho ga mchog gis nyin re bzhin du 'khor lo mchod byed cing //
T02D1553:204b-8: cho ga ji bzhin thang ka'i mdun du lha mo'i sngags kyi bzlas pa yang byed pa //
T02D1553:204b-9: des ni 'gro don sna tshogs skyed pa'i yang dag grub pa nges par thob 'gyur zhing //
T02D1553:204b-10: 'jig rten dag na mdangs 'bar lha mo lta bur shin tu mchod pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1553:204b-11: rjes chags snying ldan gos dmar can gyi bsgrub bya gang yin mdun du bltas byas nas //
T02D1553:204b-12: rdo rje zhags pas mgul nas legs par bcings shing brang nas lcags kyus phug nas ni //
T02D1553:204b-13: thal sbyar gcer bur drangs nas rang gi rkang gnyis la ni 'gyel bar gar byed pa //
T02D1553:204b-14: do ma bis ra da'i skye bo lta bur des ni shin tu byed par 'gyur //
T02D1553:204b-15: gang gi mgo la rdo rje'i rtse mos bsnun cing thod gnas khrag gis mig bkang ba //
T02D1553:204b-16: de ni rdo rje'i lus can yin du zin kyang myur bar gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro //
T02D1553:204b-17: sa bon 'od zer bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin tshogs kyis shi ba gang gi rma bkrus shing //
T02D1553:204b-18: kha tv'am la gnas skra dang bcas pa'i dril bus des ni yang dag 'tsho bar 'gyur //
T02D1553:204b-19: ye shes dbab pa'i cho ga las phan yon sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1553:204b-21: // / ye shes dbab pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin brjod pas bsod nams zla ba nya ba yi //
T02D1553:204b-22: 'od ltar dkar zhing nyes pa ma lus sel ba bdag gis bsgrubs gyur gang yin pa //
T02D1553:204b-23: des ni 'gro rnams nyon mongs ma lus dang bral yon yan rmas kyi gter gyur pa //
T02D1553:204b-24: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo'i ye shes snang bas rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur //
T02D1553:204b-25: ye shes dbab pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi
T02D1553:204b-26: cho ga'i mchod dpal stong nyid ting 'dzin gyis mdzad
T02D1553:204b-28: / bal bo'i a'a ts'a r-ya bha rendra ru tsi dang /
